snippet: Thousands of Tunisian women marched in the capital, Tunis, Monday night, to protest a provision in the new Islamist government's draft constitution describing women as "complementary to men."
abstract: Thousands of Tunisian women marched in the capital, Tunis, Monday night, to protest a provision in the new Islamist government's draft constitution describing women as "complementary to men."

headline.main: Tunisian Women March to Defend Equality
